channel.title: Astirch #289
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab122/kryptixsigs/Astirch/astirchadvertisementlogo_zps08e9e589.png[/img]
Note: the server is in early beta right now. There might be some connection issues during the beta there will be a reset once we're out of beta Download our client [url=http://astirch.com/client/loader.jar]here[/url]
[COLOR=orange][SIZE=5]WHAT IS ASTIRCH?[/SIZE][/COLOR] Astirch started out as a 194 look-alike project, but due to many model glitches it was updated to a 289 look-alike. The main goal for this server is to become an economy server with features for both pkers and skillers.
Many and many hours have been spent to give you guys enjoyable content while not making the area to big. Which makes sure you'll not be the only one around.
[COLOR=orange][SIZE=5]SKILLS[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SPOILER] [COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Melee Combat[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- All weapons - Special attacks - Player vs Player - Player vs NPC - Player Clipping - Projectile Clipping[/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Ranged Combat[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- All Bows/arrows - Darts - Throwing knifes - Special attacks - Player vs Player - Player vs NPC - NPC Clipping - Projectile Clipping[/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Magic[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Player vs Player - Player vs NPC[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]- Spells on Items[/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Prayer[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Headicons - All protection prayers - Stat boosts[/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Agility[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Full Gnome Agility Course[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Barbarian agility course[/color] [Color=red]- Wilderness agility course[/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Herblore[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Herb identifying[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]- Potion creating[/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Thieving[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Stalls[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]- NPCs[/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Crafting[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Gem Crafting - Jewelry Crafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]- Leather Crafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]- Spinning wheel[/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Fletching[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- All Bows (unstringed) - Arrow shafts - Arrow creating[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]- Bow Stringing[/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Mining[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- All ores - Random gems[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]- rock respawning[/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Smithing[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Bronze - Iron - Steel - Mithril - Adamant - Rune[/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Fishing[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- shrimp - Trout - Tuna - Lobster - Swordfish - Shark - Manta [/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Cooking[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- shrimp - Trout - Tuna - Lobster - Swordfish - Shark - Manta [/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Firemaking[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- clipped - All logs - Fire removing - Ashes[/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]Woodcutting[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Tree - All trees - Tree respawning - Decent timing[/COLOR]
[COLOR=brown][SIZE=4]RuneCrafting[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- All runes - Talisman[/COLOR] [/SPOILER]
[COLOR=orange][SIZE=5]MINIGAMES[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SPOILER] Coming soon
[/SPOILER]

item.title: Astirch #289
item.dc:creator: @Fabrice_L Fabrice L
item.description:
@Fabrice_L wrote:

[quote=“Beast1233, post:10, topic:543020”][quote author=Fabrice L link=topic=661897.msg4424556#msg4424556 date=1400200391]

Not to mention that making your player base think its not in beta and then reset it is rude.

Did you even read? on every single one of my threads it clearly states that the server is in early beta, which obviously comes with a reset, since it’s more like an alpha testphase…
[/quote]

nice going editing your post so it makes him wrong. tried the server but everyone says its going to get reset, so no point in playing it for me. gl[/quote]

In the edit, I only added that there will be a reset. the beta part has always been there.

Read full topic

item.title: Astirch #289
item.dc:creator: @Beast1233 Beast1233
item.description:
@Beast1233 wrote:

[quote=“Fabrice L, post:9, topic:543020”][quote author=Ykcud link=topic=661897.msg4424500#msg4424500 date=1400154696]
Not to mention that making your player base think its not in beta and then reset it is rude.
[/quote]

Did you even read? on every single one of my threads it clearly states that the server is in early beta, which obviously comes with a reset, since it’s more like an alpha testphase…[/quote]

nice going editing your post so it makes him wrong. tried the server but everyone says its going to get reset, so no point in playing it for me. gl

item.title: Astirch #289
item.dc:creator: @Fabrice_L Fabrice L
item.description:

Ykcud:

Not to mention that making your player base think its not in beta and then reset it is rude.

item.title: Astirch #289
item.dc:creator: @Ykcud Ykcud
item.description:
@Ykcud wrote:

If your server is in beta and you plan on making a reset, you should mention that on your ad(s), Otherwise you waste the time and effort some of your players put in to your server and lose a lot of your credibility. Not to mention that making your player base think its not in beta and then reset it is rude.

Read full topic

item.title: Astirch #289
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

Ashi:

Looks kinda boring

To be honest, this sort of revision/era will only be enjoyed by a portion of the private server community. It isnt a bad era at all, but it just lacks content unless they go with some originality.

Read full topic

item.title: Astirch #289
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Looks kinda boring

Read full topic

item.title: Astirch #289
item.dc:creator: @Fabrice_L Fabrice L
item.description:
@Fabrice_L wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:4, topic:543020”]Played it for a bit now.

I have to say the begin was hard for me, as i had no idea where to go.
The dungeon is done nice, with item drops.
Although after beta i hope there’s better melee shops, and balanced item drops.
As for now, i can’t even collect full adamant. :palm:[/quote]

Thats normal atm… its due to having to many drops on one npc will get better when more npcs are added

The drop system works as intended though.

Read full topic

item.title: Astirch #289
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Played it for a bit now.

I have to say the begin was hard for me, as i had no idea where to go.
The dungeon is done nice, with item drops.
Although after beta i hope there’s better melee shops, and balanced item drops.
As for now, i can’t even collect full adamant. :palm:

Read full topic

Not a fan of the revision but it looks pretty complete so props for that!

thanks man alot of work has been put into this server.

[CENTER]

Note: the server is in early beta right now. There might be some connection issues during the beta
there will be a reset once we’re out of beta
Download our client here

[COLOR=orange][SIZE=5]WHAT IS ASTIRCH?[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Astirch started out as a 194 look-alike project, but due to many model glitches it was updated to a 289 look-alike.
The main goal for this server is to become an economy server with features for both pkers and skillers.

Many and many hours have been spent to give you guys enjoyable content while not making the area to big. Which makes sure you’ll not be the only one around.
